TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaElement extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaParticle

summary.span: 按 WWW 联合会 (W3C) 指定的方式显示 来自 XML 架构的元素。

span.span: Represents the element from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

summary.span: 此类是所有微粒类型的基类，用于描述 XML 文档中的元素。

span.span: This class is the base class for all particle types and is used to describe an element in an XML document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > - 不要使用来自未知或不受信任的源或位置的架构。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources or locations. 这样做会破坏代码的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. > - XML 架构 (包括内联架构) 在本质上容易受到拒绝服务攻击;不要在不受信任的情况下接受它们。XML schemas (including inline schemas) are inherently vulnerable to denial of service attacks; do not accept them in untrusted scenarios. > - 架构验证错误消息和异常可能会向架构文件公开有关内容模型或 URI 路径的敏感信息。Schema validation error messages and exceptions may expose sensitive information about the content model or URI paths to the schema file. 请注意不要向不受信任的调用方公开此信息。Be careful not to expose this information to untrusted callers. ## Examples 下面的示例创建 `element` 元素。The following example creates the `element` element. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaElement Example/CPP/element.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaElement Example/CS/element.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlSchemaElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaElement Example/VB/element.vb#1)] 下面的 XML 文件用于前面的代码示例。The following XML file is used for the preceding code example. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlSchemaElement Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaElement Example/XML/example.xsd#2)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置 派生。

span.span: Gets or sets a derivation.

value.span: 用于阻止类型派生的属性。

span.span: The attribute used to block a type derivation.
Default value is .
Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以包含以下值：This attribute can contain the following values: |枚举Enum|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |`None`|使用架构的属性定义的派生限制 `BlockDefault` （如果存在）。Use the derivation restriction defined by the `BlockDefault` property of the schema, if it exists.| |`Empty`|对此元素的替换没有限制。There are no restrictions on replacements of this element.| |`Substitution`|此元素不能替换为通过替换派生的类型。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Substitution.| |`Extension`|此元素不能替换为通过扩展派生的类型。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| |`Restriction`|此元素不能由限制派生的类型替换。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| |`All`|`#all`.`#all`. 无论使用何种派生方法，都无法将此元素替换为任何类型。This element cannot be replaced by any type regardless of derivation method.| 此属性不会阻止派生，但会阻止派生替换实例中的类型。This property does not prevent derivation, but prevents derivation from replacing the type in an instance. 属性不支持 List 和 union 值 `block` 。List and union values are not supported for the `block` property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BlockResolved As XmlSchemaDerivationMethod

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取 属性的编译后值。

span.span: Gets the post-compilation value of the property.
The post-compilation value of the property.

value.span: 默认为 元素中的 值。

span.span: The default is the value on the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该值指示在实例文档中使用 `xsi:type` 时如何强制类型。This value indicates how the type is enforced when `xsi:type` is used in the instance document. 例如，如果值受到限制，则只能使用特定的已定义类型，而不能使用特定定义类型的限制派生的类型。For example, if the value is restricted, only the specific defined type can be used, not types derived by restriction from the specific defined type. 此属性可包含下表中显示的值。This property can contain the values shown in the following table. 默认值为 `None`。The default is `None`. 此属性不允许使用 List 和 union 派生方法。List and union derivation methods are not allowed on this property. |枚举Enum|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |`Empty`|对此元素的替换没有限制。There are no restrictions on replacements of this element.| |`Substitution`|此元素不能替换为通过替换派生的类型。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Substitution.| |`Extension`|此元素不能替换为通过扩展派生的类型。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| |`Restriction`|此元素不能由限制派生的类型替换。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| |`All`|`#all`.`#all`. 无论使用何种派生方法，都无法将此元素替换为任何类型。This element cannot be replaced by any type regardless of derivation method.|

The collection of constraints.

span.span: Gets or sets the default value of the element if its content is a simple type or content of the element is .
The default value for the element.
The default is a null reference.
Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `fixed` 和 `default` 特性互相排斥。The `fixed` and `default` attributes are mutually exclusive. 如果元素包含简单类型，则该值必须是该类型的有效值。If the element contains a simple type, this value must be a valid value of that type.

summary.span: 获取或设置 属性以指示不允许进一步派生。

span.span: Gets or sets the property to indicate that no further derivations are allowed.
The property.
The default is .
Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以包含下表中显示的值。This attribute can contain the values shown in the following table. |枚举Enum|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |`None`|使用架构的属性定义的派生限制 `FinalDefault` （如果存在）。Use the derivation restriction defined by the `FinalDefault` property of the schema, if it exists.| |`Empty`|此元素的派生没有限制。There are no restrictions on derivations of this element.| |`Extension`|此元素不能通过扩展派生。This element cannot be derived by Extension.| |`Restriction`|此元素不能通过限制派生。This element cannot be derived by Restriction.| |`All`|`#all`.`#all`. 此元素不能由任何派生方法派生。This element cannot be derived by any derivation method.| 另请参阅 。See also . `Substitution``List` `Union` 此属性不允许使用、和派生方法。`Substitution`, `List`, and `Union` derivation methods are not allowed for this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值是 `elementFormDefault` 包含元素的元素的属性值 `schema` 。The default value is the value of the `elementFormDefault` attribute for the `schema` element containing the element. 默认值为 `Unqualified`。The default is `Unqualified`. |枚举Enum|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |`Qualified`|元素必须用命名空间前缀限定。Element must be qualified with the namespace prefix.| |`Unqualified`|不需要用命名空间前缀限定元素。Element is not required to be qualified with the namespace prefix.| 如果包含元素是元素，则不能设置值 `schema` 。The value cannot be set if the containing element is the `schema` element.

summary.span: 获取或设置元素的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the element.
The name of the element.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该名称必须是 NCName (无冒号名称) ，如万维网联合会 (W3C) XML 命名空间规范中所定义。The name must be an NCName (no-colon name) as defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML Namespaces specification. `Name` 和 `RefName` 特性是互相排斥的。`Name` and `RefName` attributes are mutually exclusive.

The qualified name of the element.
The post-compilation value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ref`属性引用的名称。 is the name that a `ref` attribute refers to. 限定名由元素的 NCName 组成。The qualified name consists of the NCName of the element. 例如，元素名称 = "NCName"，以及用于描述该架构的的前缀 `targetNamespace` 。For example, element name = "NCName", and the prefix used to describe the `targetNamespace` of the schema. 此属性保存属性的编译后值 `QualifiedName` 。This property holds the post-compilation value of the `QualifiedName` property.

summary.span: 获取或设置在该架构（或指定的命名空间指示的另一个架构）中声明的元素的引用名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the reference name of an element declared in this schema (or another schema indicated by the specified namespace).
The reference name of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `RefName`必须是 QName。The `RefName` must be a QName. `RefName`可以包含命名空间前缀。The `RefName` can include a namespace prefix. 如果特性存在，则所有、、、、、、、、、 `RefName` `complexType` 和都 `simpleType` 必须不 `key` `keyref` `unique` `nillable` `default` `fixed` `form` `block` `type` 存在。If `RefName` attribute is present, all `complexType`, `simpleType`, `key`, `keyref`, `unique`, `nillable`, `default`, `fixed`, `form`, `block`, and `type` must be absent. 如果 `RefName` 存在，则 `minOccurs` `maxOccurs` 允许、和 `id` 。If `RefName` is present, `minOccurs`, `maxOccurs`, and `id` are allowed. 若要使用现有元素定义声明元素，请使用 `RefName` 属性指定现有的元素定义。To declare an element using an existing element definition, use the `RefName` attribute to specify the existing element definition. 如果包含元素是元素，则不能设置值 `schema` 。The value cannot be set if the containing element is the `schema` element.

summary.span: 获取或设置由该元素替换的元素的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of an element that is being substituted by this element.

value.span: 由该元素替换的元素的限定名称。

span.span: The qualified name of an element that is being substituted by this element.
Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该元素必须具有相同的类型或从指定元素类型派生的类型。This element must have the same type or a type derived from the type of the specified element. 该值必须是 QName。This value must be a QName. 如果包含元素是元素，则不能设置值 `schema` 。The value cannot be set if the containing element is the `schema` element.
